location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: 1 blueprint folioDimensions: 720mm x 520mmFoliation: The map sheet has a foliation number in the top right hand corner of the folio. The number is enclosed by a circle.

mods.abstract: Map showing Bahrain, its territorial waters and surrounding coastlines. An area is marked on the map using red lines which connect points labelled A - I; this outlined area, which covers Bahrain's territorial islands and waters but not the main island itself, is to be granted to Petroleum Concessions Limited (P.C.L.) under the alloted area concession.Map enlarged in the Land Department of the Government of BahrainVerso of map sheet contains information recorded by the Political Agent at Bahrain including the volume and page reference the map should be inserted at; the date it was received from the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain, Charles Dalyrmple Belgrave; and the letter reference it accompanied
